# Swift Magic
## Overview
*Swift Magic:* Three times per day, a rogue with this talent can cast one of her a [[Minor Magic|minor magic]] or [[Major Magic|major magic]] spells as a swift action as if using the Quicken Spell-like Ability feat. The rogue must have the [[Major Magic|major magic]] talent and be at least 10th level before selecting this talent.

**Source:** Legendary Rogues (Legendary Games), pg. 14
